name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|
tweet:
Every person I know who has been through therapy has a better handle on their mental health than people who have never been to therapy. 
We are talking about triggers, regulation, self-care etc.

name: Laura McConnell

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|
tweet:
@_garmc It‚Äôs the practical side of OT that helps with all the things you are struggling with NOW.

@HolSmale @MxOolong @normonaut @DrRJChapman I‚Äôd agree. Ultimately, all of us can have the best of intentions. But our words or actions may affect other people in a way we did not intend. The measure of us is how we respond to that. 
Sometimes we can make good. Other times it‚Äôs too late. But that‚Äôs life.

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|
tweet:
@MxOolong @normonaut @HolSmale @DrRJChapman Whether or not they intend to do it doesn‚Äôt mean they don‚Äôt do it. 

In fact, I‚Äôd say that arguing something didn‚Äôt happen because the person didn‚Äôt intend it is the very definition of gaslighting.

tweet: @HolSmale @MxOolong @normonaut @DrRJChapman Exactly. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs unintended, but there is no argument to be had here or anywhere about the definition of abuse.

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|

@MxOolong @normonaut @HolSmale @DrRJChapman Just like murder. If you intend to batter someone, but they die as a result. They are still dead. It‚Äôs not accidental battering death- it‚Äôs murder. 
So if you shit on someone to feel better about yourself & they are traumatised, it‚Äôs not accidental shitty feelings- it‚Äôs abuse.

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|
tweet:

I‚Äôm also totally convinced his actions were all about him and how he felt and not actually about abusing me.

name: Laura McConnell
description: Writer| Keynote Speaker| Radio presenter @teacherhugradio| #ActuallyAutistic| #ADHD| #Deaf| Words in @TES | Rep: Kenny@speakoutuk.com| Sign name LM in #BSL|
tweet:
@MxOolong @normonaut @HolSmale @DrRJChapman With what he felt was a power imbalance he was uncomfortable with. 
I would cry, I would withdraw, I would be less confident, I would see my family less, we didn‚Äôt have to socialise with people in that group any more. He therefore felt more comfortable. It got his anger out too‚Ä¶

name: Laura McConnell
